Class EMLParser

extends java.lang.Object

        Uses default session. Any property will be ignored.

      • set

        public EMLParser set(java.util.Properties properties)
        Copies properties from given set. If session is already created, exception will be thrown.

      • set

                     java.lang.String value)
        Sets property for the session. If session is already created, exception will be thrown.
